attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We spend many days, weeks and months away from home. Toil in extreme cold or hot conditions. Those on operations spend most days taking cover from incoming fire. Yet a new Private receives the same starting salary than that of a new employee at Burger King. We implore the British Government to increase wages in all sectors of the military, to that of something that can truely represent the hard work and blood shed in protection of this country.
